item.title: Ecpise with cmake project on windows
item.description: CMake is a powerfull tool to manage c/c++ projects and I preffer to use in on my embbeded projects also. Usually I work in linux enviementn in terminal and Iin linux enviroments , every thing installed in the place and thing works great, but when I had to switch it to eclipse on windows envement ,that was a changled task so I describe here the stages that I had to make in order import my cmkae forject from linux to windos based on eclipse.
